User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; nl; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; nl; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13

Title bar disappears when I switch to full screen. Build 1.9.2.8. 
Persisted upon updating to 1.9.2.13 and rebooting.



Reproducible: Always





Yesterday also my menu bar and tabs were gone. these came back when I rebooted. May have been too many tabs open (>30). Can't reproduce this at will
comments.author: Leo.tebraake@hetnet.nl
